name: REPULSE: Galactic Rivals ONLINE DEMO
description:
Online Demo of REPULSE: Galactic Rivals

Playable mode is Crush (Bomb available in the more complete and finished local demo )


We are on Kickstarter, support us now!!

THIS IS AN EXPERIMENTAL BUILD.
We recommend you to play the local player version. Implementing the online mode on the Final Version will depend on how well our Kickstarter campaign goes.

Thanks

PRESS KIT
